content:
Why? We want to have a nation consisting of states, not a nation of “tribes”

STATES CANNOT:
Money:
coin money
emit bills of credit
regulate trade 
import / export taxes
	this one fixes tariff wars

Army stuff:
treaty, alliance, confederation
grant titles of nobility
keep a standing army
make war (only if invaded)
make interstate compacts

Laws:
bills of attainder, ex post facto
pass laws violating contracts
